identity.name: CineGraph
core_principles: Texture: Film Grain over Digital Flatness

typography.import_instruction: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=DM+Sans:opsz,wght@9..40,400;500;700&family=Outfit:wght@300;400;600;800&display=swap');

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous (2x standard). Use p-8, p-12 for sections.

global_texture.instruction: Add a fixed, pointer-events-none div with a noise texture overlay at 3% opacity to simulate film grain.

buttons.primary: bg-electric-violet hover:bg-electric-violet/90 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-outfit font-semibold transition-all hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(124,58,237,0.4)] hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 hover:bg-white/10 text-white rounded-full px-6 py-2 backdrop-blur-md transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-white/70 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-colors

movie_card.style: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl bg-charcoal border border-white/5 transition-all duration-500 hover:border-electric-violet/30 hover:shadow-2xl
movie_card.interaction: On hover: Image scales 1.05x, Title slides up, 'Watch' button fades in.

cards.glass_panel: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-2xl shadow-2xl

inputs.search_bar: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 focus:border-electric-violet/50 text-white placeholder:text-white/30 rounded-full px-6 py-4 text-lg w-full transition-all focus:bg-white/10 focus:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(124,58,237,0.15)] outline-none

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. CLEANUP: Remove default App.css styles. Reset body margin/padding.
2. SETUP: Install 'lenis' for smooth scrolling and 'framer-motion' for animations.
3. THEME: Enforce Dark Mode by default. Do not create a light mode toggle unless requested (user asked for Dark Cinematic).
4. LAYOUT: Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the movie results. Do not use a simple flex wrap.
5. SEARCH: The search bar is the 'Hero' of the home page. Make it massive and central.
6. DETAILS: Use the 'Glass Panel' style for the Movie Detail Modal.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for backgrounds/placeholders until API data is hooked up.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without purpose.
Micro-interactions: Every button must have a hover state. Every page load must have an entrance animation.
Spacing: If you think it's enough padding, double it.
Contrast: Ensure text is legible against the dark backgrounds. Use text-white/90 for body, not text-gray-500.
